Excellent at multi- tasking effectively, implementing decisions, enhancing productivity, meeting companies' goals and deadlines, and working in an individual and team work environment with little oversight.
My business background allowed me to obtain the skills to be very organized, detailed — orientated , professional, confidential, trustworthy, patient, helpful, trainable, dependable, and resourceful.

<JD_START>
Job Title: SCRUM Master 1

Location: Oakbrook Terrace, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Overview

 PLS ® : People. Location. Service  :

Why PLS? Because You Deserve Better!® PLS - which stands for People∙Location∙Service - is a leading retail provider of financial services. The “P” comes first, because our customers are at the center of everything we do, and we recognize that it’s our exceptional team members who go above and beyond every day. The PLS Group, headquartered in Chicago, is comprised of over 200 financial service centers in 12 states. Through our check cashing, lending, and our PLS Auto store, we provide consumers with convenient financial products and services to help them manage their day-to-day financial needs. Although many of our customers have banking relationships, we believe that our customers use our financial services because they are more convenient, transparent, and frequently more affordable than available traditional alternatives. PLS was founded in 1997 by Bob and Dan Wolfberg, who serve as Co-Presidents.

 Position Overview: 

Our Agile Development teams are hard at work designing and implementing technical solutions that will help us maintain and improve our functionality at PLS, and we are excited to add a Scrum Master to help our squads! Our Scrum Master will teach Scrum and support our Agile Development Teams as they adopt and apply Lean and Agile Principles, implement the Scrum Framework, self-organize, and deliver working solutions.

Responsibilities

Coaches and supports the team to self-organize, use agile and the Scrum framework, limit work in process and continuously improveCreates and maintains an atmosphere of continuous learning and improvement by teamsHelps teams craft and maintain team agreements and self-organizationFacilitates all scrum events, keeping all events within the time box. Coaches the team to facilitate their Scrum events.Coaches and supports the Product Owner to manage the product Backlog.Shields the team from outside interferenceIdentifies, resolves, or escalates impediments that slow development or prevent the team from deliveringWorks to identify and address organizational impedimentsFoster and encourages team transparency through information radiators / big visible chartsSupport conflict resolutionHelps teams reach maturity in Agile principles and Scrum practices so that they operate autonomously and independent of the scrum masterCreates and facilitates trust between development teams, product owners, and other stakeholders

Qualifications

3-5 years’ experience as a Scrum Master/Coach5 + years of experience working in technology bachelor’s degree2+ years Advanced Agile (PMI-CAP, IC Agile) or Scrum Certifications (PSM II, PSPO, CSP-SM, etc.) (preferred)Requires Scrum Master Certification (CSM or PSM)Is effective at supporting 3-5 teams as Scrum MasterUnderstands and applies scaling techniques such as SAFe or LeSSUnderstands and teaches root cause analysis techniquesServes as a coach to more Junior Scrum Masters (preferred)Understands and can apply Organizational Change Frameworks (preferred)Plans and leads new teams through transition to Scrum (preferred)

Physical Requirements:

Must be able to sit and/or stand for extended periods of timeAbility to lift 15 lbs.Ability to travel on occasion

 Benefits: 

Benefits for eligible employees include medical/dental/vision, 401k, vacation, opportunities for advancement, on-going training available.

 We strive to demonstrate our Core Values in all positions at PLS: 

Communication

Customer FocusIntegrity and TrustTeamworkResults

PLS Financial Services is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, marital status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. PLS Financial Services is a drug-free workplace. PLS provides reasonable accommodations to applicants with disabilities. If you need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the application and hiring process, please notify your Recruiter or a member of our Human Resources team talent@PLS247.com to make arrangements. The decision on granting reasonable accommodation will be made on a case-by-case basis.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
